mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GroupCategory (groupCode, groupName, bindNum, classCode, groupNum ) VALUES (#{groupCode}, #{groupName}, #{bindNum}, #{classCode}, #{groupNum});

INSERT INTO StudentGroup (email, groupCode, groupName, position, groupLeaderState, groupTable, classCode) VALUES (#{email}, #{groupCode}, #{groupName}, #{position}, #{groupLeaderState}, #{groupTable}, #{classCode})
mapper.select: SELECT m.email as email, m.name as name, m.photoSrc as photoSrc, s.groupCode as groupCode, s.groupName as groupName, s.classCode as classCode, s.groupTable as groupTable, s.position as position, s.groupLeaderState as groupLeaderState FROM studentgroup s JOIN member m ON s.email = m.email WHERE classCode=#{classCode}
